for_sales.sales_text: Leonid: free to a good home; a restoration project.   An 18’ gunter-rigged 3/4-decked day sailer, clinker-built of larch on oak by J. Hinks & Sons of Appledore in the mid-fifties, this fine boat was given me a few years ago to make room for something else. I have replaced most of the ribs that needed doing, ditto planking including one of the garboards. She has a 3”x 3” full length iron keel slotted for her centre-plate. All her douglas spars are in excellent condition, and she has a full set of rigging, also a suit of sails which fit her, though probably made for a different boat originally. All-up weight between 1/2 and 3/4 ton, at present lying under cover as shown in West Somerset.

boat.name: LEONID
boat.short_description: Half-decked clinker-built gunter rigged sloop, iron keel slotted for centreplate. Complete with all spars, rigging and sails.
